fields.label: Does your business have agents authorized to act on behalf of customers who are individuals?
Does your program include a procedure to collect the full name of each individual acting for or on behalf of an individual customer?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting the agent's full name.

fields.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect evidence of the individual customer's authorization of their agent?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting evidence of authorization.

fields.label: Does your program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether, and to what extent, to verify the identity of the individual customer's agent?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls for determining verification extent.

fields.label: Does your business have regard to the ML/TF risk of the service when determining the extent of verification for an individual customer's agent?
fields.detail-label: How does your business have regard to ML/TF risk in this context?

fields.label: Does your business have agents authorized to act on behalf of customers who are not individuals (non-natural persons)?
Does your program include a procedure to collect the full name of each individual acting for or on behalf of a non-natural customer?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting the agent's full name.

fields.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect evidence of the non-natural customer's authorization of their agent?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting evidence of authorization.

fields.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether, and to what extent, to verify the identity of the non-natural customer's agent?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls for determining verification extent.

fields.label: Does your business have regard to the ML/TF risk of the service when determining the extent of verification for a non-natural customer's agent?
fields.detail-label: How does your business have regard to ML/TF risk in this context?

fields.label: Does your program provide for agents of non-natural customers to be identified by a customer-appointed verifying officer?
Does your program require the agent to be identified by the verifying officer in accordance with the collection requirements in 4.11.13?
Does your business identify and verify the identity of the verifying officer?
fields.detail-label: Describe the process for identifying and verifying the verifying officer.

fields.label: Does your business collect evidence of the customer's authorization of the verifying officer?
Does your program require the customer to retain a record of all matters collected by the verifying officer?
Does the verifying officer provide the full name of the agent to your business?
Does the verifying officer provide a copy of the signature of the agent to your business?
Does the verifying officer collect the full name of the agent?
Does the verifying officer collect the title of the position or role held by the agent with the customer?
Does the verifying officer collect a copy of the signature of the agent?
Does the verifying officer collect evidence of the agent's authorization to act?
